title: Healthy Donor - Epcam- (rep. 1)
characteristics_ch1: cell type: Human thymic epithelial cell
extract_protocol_ch1: RNA was extracted from Epcam-enriched hTEC subsets by using ReliaPrepTM RNA MiniPrep System (Promega) according to manufacturer’s recommendations
extract_protocol_ch1.1: Full-length RNA-seq libraries were prepared using the SMART-Seq2 protocol
data_processing: Basecalling using blc2fastq and trimming using cutadapt
data_processing.1: Alignment using HISAT2 and gene abundance estimation using featurecounts
data_processing.2: Differential gene expression computed using edgeR
contact_institute: San Raffaele Telethon Institute for Gene Therapy
